docs.snippet: If not for a confluence of improbable events last year, the Spurs would not be on a mission for atonement, and the Heat would not be chasing a third consecutive title....
docs.lead_paragraph: If not for a confluence of improbable events last year, the Spurs would not be on a mission for atonement, and the Heat would not be chasing a third consecutive title.
docs.abstract: San Antonio Spurs are on a mission of atonement, and Miami Heat are chasing their third consecutive title as they prepare for the 2014 NBA finals.

headline.main: Spurs and Heat Are Starting Where the What-Ifs Left Off
headline.print_headline: Spurs and the Heat Are Starting Where the What-Ifs Left Off

docs.snippet: After a seven-game showdown in last season’s N.B.A. finals, the Heat and the Spurs left their cores intact, but they have continued adapting on the way to a rematch....
docs.lead_paragraph: After a seven-game showdown in last season’s N.B.A. finals, the Heat and the Spurs left their cores intact, but they have continued adapting on the way to a rematch.
docs.abstract: Analysis; Miami Heat and San Antonio Spurs, after a seven game showdown in 2013 NBA finals, will meet in 2014 finals; despite contrasting methods of talent acquisition, each club’s success stems from the same principles: organizational stability and clarity of vision from the ownership to the last man on the bench.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Finalists Once More, Heat and Spurs Show Their Adaptability

docs.snippet: Donald Sterling made an agreement with the N.B.A. to “resolve all their differences” and gave his consent to a deal negotiated by his wife to sell the team that they co-own, Sterling’s lawyer said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Sterling made an agreement with the N.B.A. to “resolve all their differences” and gave his consent to a deal negotiated by his wife to sell the team that they co-own, Sterling’s lawyer said.
docs.abstract: Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling reportedly gives his consent to deal negotiated by his estranged wife Rochelle to sell the team to former Microsoft executive Steve Ballmer; also agrees to drop lawsuit that accuses the NBA of violating his constitutional rights by using recordings of his remarks as the basis for his lifetime ban.

headline.main: Sterling Agrees to Sale of Clippers, and to Drop Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Sterling Agrees to Sale, and to Drop Lawsuit

docs.snippet: When the San Antonio Spurs meet the Miami Heat in the N.B.A. finals, Tim Duncan, Dwyane Wade and others will have a chance to add to substantial jewelry collections....
docs.lead_paragraph: When the San Antonio Spurs meet the Miami Heat in the N.B.A. finals, Tim Duncan, Dwyane Wade and others will have a chance to add to substantial jewelry collections.
docs.abstract: San Antonio Spurs and Miami Heat players have the chance to add to their championship ring collection when the two dynasties meet at the 2014 NBA finals; number of championship rings collected by players on both teams noted.

headline.main: A Familiar Ring for Members of Heat and Spurs

docs.snippet: In all, 40 people were arrested on charges of conspiracy, assault and weapons offenses in connection with violence in and around two housing projects....
docs.lead_paragraph: In all, 40 people were arrested on charges of conspiracy, assault and weapons offenses in connection with violence in and around two housing projects.
docs.abstract: Dozens of gang suspects are arrested in simultaneous police raids on two Manhattan housing projects, charged with conspiracy, assault and weapons offenses; crimes alleged include two killings and at least 19 shootings between January 2010 and May 2014; early-morning arrests are latest in strategy honed by Manhattan's district attorney and Police Department.

headline.main: Dozens of Gang Suspects Held in Raids in Manhattan
headline.print_headline: Dozens of Gang Suspects Held in Raids in Manhattan
